metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6874 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Race condition in kernel/ucount.c in the Linux kernel through 4.10.2 allowslocal users to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and system crash)or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted system calls thatleverage certain decrement behavior that causes incorrect interactionbetween put_ucounts and get_ucounts.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
